professionalSummary: Technical professional with vast experience in robotics, AI, and industrial automation, leveraging hands-on expertise. Adept at translating user requirements into technical roadmaps, designing end-to-end solutions, and driving cross-functional teams to deliver innovative products that solve real-world problems.

experience.title: Application & Computer Vision Engineer
responsibilities: Developed key product features including a deep learning defect detection module for aerospace remanufacturing, reducing manual inspection effort.
Owned the back-end server architecture enabling seamless communication between industrial robots and perception systems for automated toolpath generation.
Collaborated with clients and internal teams to gather requirements, present solutions, and optimize user experience for diverse automation projects (ABB, UR, KUKA, Fanuc).

experience.title: Research & Development Engineer
responsibilities: Led automation initiatives involving computer vision and non-destructive testing for collaborative robot platforms, ensuring smart and efficient inspection.
Designed an adaptive inspection system leveraging computer graphics to generate synthetic data for AI training, significantly reducing development time.
Published 2 papers and co-invented 7 research solutions, demonstrating thought leadership and innovation in AI-driven robotics.

experience.title: Tech Lead & Co-Mechanical Lead (Undergraduate Research Team)
responsibilities: Coordinated product development cycles for award-winning autonomous underwater vehicles, focusing on user-centric design and rapid prototyping.
Managed stakeholder relationships (university sponsors, competition organizers), ensuring alignment on project milestones and deliverables.

awards: First Place at NUS IEEE Hackathon

education.degree: Diploma in Aerospace Technology (with Business Minor)

honorsAwards: JTC-NUS Gold Medal for Final Year Project – Robotic Eye Surgery Mechanism Design
NUS IEEE Hackathon – Best Innovative & Mind-blowing Hack
Multiple academic awards in innovation, engineering design, and leadership
